name: Handy Harry's Haunted House Services
description:
Handy Harry's Haunted House Services is a online multiplayer coop horror game with a retro look. You and up to 7 other players are tasked with preforming some routine electrical work for a customer.



Explore randomly generated, labyrinthian and spine-chilling levels in search of broken fuse boxes. Find them, fix them and do it quickly before the ghost that haunts the darkness catches you. But don't worry, with your trusty friends at your back and your (admittedly mediocre) flashlight by your side you'll be able to get the job done because here at Handy Harry's House Services we always get the job done, no matter the odds, and you better get it done otherwise you'll certainly meet a fate worse than death.



currently Featuring:
  • Up to 8 player multiplayer: Simple to host and join games.
  • Randomly generated levels: Every game is a new challenge.
  • AI Generated Jumpscares: Never before seen! Every jumpscare is uniquely terrifying.
  • Character customization: Escape alive to earn batteries that you can then spend at the shop. Have yourself look like a true professional!
  • PvP mode: Try your hand at being the ghost and be the one to spook your friends.
  • Endless mode: Clear floor after floor, soon you will all die but who will be the last to survive?
